data.description:
Griphic is where intelligent systems meet purposeful design.

Founded by engineers from IIT Delhi and backed by SKETS Studio, we create solutions that help people interact smarter, decide faster, and build better. From hyper-realistic interviews with Cerebrus to different frameworks across industries, our work blends cutting-edge tech with real-world clarity.

We collaborate across disciplines like AI, ML, and VR, designed to rethink how tools should function. Our backing from SKETS Studio (with 2,000+ global projects) grounds our innovation in experience, scale, and design excellence.
data.description_enriched: Griphic is a technology-driven solutions company that combines advanced technologies to address real-world challenges and drive significant industry disruption. They combine cutting-edge artificial intelligence with hyper-realistic virtual experiences to push the boundaries of what's possible.

company_updates.reshared_post_author_headline: Attended Indian Institute of Information Technology Nagpur
company_updates.reshared_post_description:
𝖠 𝖬𝗈𝗆𝖾𝗇𝗍 𝗈𝖿 𝖱𝖾𝖿𝗅𝖾𝖼𝗍𝗂𝗈𝗇: 𝖲𝗁𝖺𝗋𝗂𝗇𝗀 𝗆𝗒 𝖥𝖺𝗋𝖾𝗐𝖾𝗅𝗅 𝖠𝖽𝖽𝗋𝖾𝗌𝗌 𝖺𝗇𝖽 𝖤𝗑𝗉𝖾𝗋𝗂𝖾𝗇𝖼𝖾.
Griphic felt like home. Simple as that. I learned more during my internship here than I did in two years of college, because I had room to try things, make mistakes, and fix them. Some days were tough. Most days, I couldn’t wait to open the laptop.
 
When I faced an issue, I approached Akshiv K., and the bugs vanished. We’d trace it line by line until it was fixed. Short chats with Mohit Rathod cleared a lot of career fog, and he even ran a mock interview on my project that pushed me in the best way. Amit Sur was always juggling ten things, yet he still managed to help, crack a joke, and suggest the right book at the right time. Shashank Kate explains things simply and cleanly, and I picked up real habits from him. Arun Singh is basically a one-man army and somehow always had time to steer my project when I needed direction. And Sanchita Channa brought the energy that lifts a room with jokes and fun topics. 
 
I’m leaving happy, a little wiser, and very grateful. I’ll miss this team. Thank you, Griphic.

#Gratitude #Internship #Griphic #ThankYouTeam

company_updates.description:
𝗠𝘆 𝟮 𝗠𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗵𝘀 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗻𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗲𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗮𝘀 𝗮𝗻 𝗔𝗜 𝗘𝗻𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗲𝗿 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗻 𝗮𝘁 Griphic
I am excited to announce that I have successfully completed my 𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗶𝘁𝗲 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗻𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽 𝗮𝘁 𝗚𝗿𝗶𝗽𝗵𝗶𝗰, 𝗗𝗲𝗹𝗵𝗶—a journey that took me deep into the 𝗽𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗰𝗮𝗹 𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗚𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗔𝗜.
I was entrusted with a 𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗻𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗿𝗲𝘄𝗮𝗿𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗷𝗲𝗰𝘁: to design and build an 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗹𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗖𝗩 𝘀𝗰𝗿𝗲𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘄𝗲𝗯 𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 from the ground up. The goal was clear—𝗮𝘂𝘁𝗼𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗲𝗻𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗶𝗻𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗴𝗲𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗿𝗲𝗰𝗿𝘂𝗶𝘁𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 with AI.
🏗️ 𝗦𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗔𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 & 𝗔𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀
I designed a 𝗺𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶-𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝘀𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺 capable of intelligently analyzing resumes against job descriptions:
🤖 𝗔𝗴𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝟭: 𝗦𝗸𝗶𝗹𝗹 𝗘𝘃𝗮𝗹𝘂𝗮𝘁𝗼𝗿 → Scans and scores a candidate's technical & soft skills
 📈 𝗔𝗴𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝟮: 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗔𝘀𝘀𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗼𝗿 → Evaluates the depth and relevance of career history
 🏆 𝗔𝗴𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝟯: 𝗔𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗔𝗻𝗮𝗹𝘆𝘀𝘁 → Highlights key accomplishments and quantifiable results
 📊 𝗔𝗴𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝟰: 𝗔𝗴𝗴𝗿𝗲𝗴𝗮𝘁𝗼𝗿 & 𝗩𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗿 → Generates a final report and cross-checks it with the original CV for integrity & alignment
⚡ 𝗜𝗺𝗽𝗮𝗰𝘁: This system helped 𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗹𝘆𝘇𝗲 𝟴𝟬𝟬+ 𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗺𝗲𝘀 during my internship, 𝗱𝗿𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗿𝗼𝘃𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗿𝗲𝗰𝗿𝘂𝗶𝘁𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗲𝗳𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝘆 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗮𝗰𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘆.
🛠️ 𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵 𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗰𝗸 & 𝗗𝗲𝗽𝗹𝗼𝘆𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁
𝗟𝗮𝗻𝗴𝗖𝗵𝗮𝗶𝗻, 𝗟𝗮𝗻𝗴𝗚𝗿𝗮𝗽𝗵, 𝗥𝗲𝗔𝗰𝘁 𝗙𝗿𝗮𝗺𝗲𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸, 𝗢𝗽𝗲𝗻𝗔𝗜
𝗙𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗔𝗣𝗜 (backend) + 𝗥𝗲𝗮𝗰𝘁 (frontend)
𝗣𝗿𝗼𝘁𝗼𝘁𝘆𝗽𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗟𝗮𝗻𝗴𝗙𝗹𝗼𝘄
𝗗𝗲𝗽𝗹𝗼𝘆𝗲𝗱 𝗼𝗻 𝗩𝗲𝗿𝗰𝗲𝗹

This project gave me hands-on experience in 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻-𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗱𝘆 𝗚𝗲𝗻𝗔𝗜 𝗽𝗶𝗽𝗲𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀, 𝗺𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶-𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗼𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗹-𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱 𝗔𝗜 𝗱𝗲𝗽𝗹𝗼𝘆𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁.
I am immensely grateful to the 𝗚𝗿𝗶𝗽𝗵𝗶𝗰 𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗺 for their mentorship and for trusting me with a project of such scale and impact.
As I move forward, I’m excited to take on 𝗔𝗜/𝗠𝗟 𝗲𝗻𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗚𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗔𝗜 𝗼𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝘂𝗻𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗲𝘀 where I can continue to build impactful solutions. 

#Griphic #AI #GenerativeAI #LangChain #LangGraph #LangFlow #OpenAI #FastAPI #React #AIEngineer #Internship #Achievements

Griphic was born out of a belief that courage, leadership, and innovation can reshape industries.

On World Entrepreneurship Day, we celebrate the spirit of entrepreneurs everywhere who dare to imagine a different future, and build it.

#WorldEntrepreneurshipDay #Griphic #Entrepreneurs #Innovation #Leadership #Visionary #MakeInIndia

Our CEO Siddhant Bansal's birthday surprise, executed well by the team! Followed by lunch with good food, great vibes, and moments to remember.

#HappyBirthday #LifeAtGriphic #Leadership #Visionary #Celebration #TeamBonding #Cerebrus #Griphic #CEO

Every great journey needs someone who sees the destination before the rest of us can.

Siddhant Bansal, your optimism turns uncertainty into opportunity, and your belief in what’s possible keeps Griphic’s pace steady even when the road is steep.

Today, we celebrate more than your birthday. We celebrate the drive, leadership, kindness, and vision that make working alongside you something we’re proud of every day.

Here’s to another year of ideas that are valuable and moments that last. Happy Birthday from all of us at Griphic!

#HappyBirthday #TeamGriphic #Leadership #Inspiration #Visionary #CelebratingSuccess

At Griphic, we value the freedom to question, to design with care, decide with confidence, and deliver with pride.
 
A happy Independence Day to every citizen of our beautiful country!

#IndependenceDay #MadeInIndia #Griphic #TechInnovation #CelebrateFreedom #Cerebrus #IndependenceDay2025

“How do these machines learn to dream up stories, paint images, or write code from scratch?”

The answer is written in decades of quiet progress. Let’s trace the developments, big and small, that built the foundation for today’s Generative AI, and try to imagine where it might take us in the years to come.

#GenerativeAI #AIEvolution #ArtificialIntelligence #MachineLearning #DeepLearning #AIHistory #FutureOfAI #Griphic #Cerebrus

From snacks to sticky note scribbles, to nicknames and stories that we’re still laughing about, Fun Fridays at Griphic have their own legacy.

Here’s a recap of what our Fridays have looked like over the last few months.

#TeamGriphic #FunFriday #TeamBonding #LifeAtGriphic #Cerebrus #FunAtWork #OfficeCulture

Wishing a wonderful year ahead to Anmol Mathur, who celebrated his birthday this month. 

May you have a year filled with laughter, luck, and good energy!

#HappyBirthday #TeamGriphic #TeamBonding #Celebration #Cerebrus #Griphic

An effective solution to interview bottlenecks should have the basic capability to make the process faster, more efficient, and easier to scale. But transferring the interviews to someone else doesn’t get you there.

#Cerebrus #IaaS #Automation #AutomatedHiring #HiringSolutions #SmartHiring #SaaS #TechBlog #Blog #CerebrusApp

We’re sure you know that mitochondria are the powerhouse of a cell. The same way, Ashwani is the powerhouse of Griphic.

She manages, plans, ideates, and adds a spark to everything she’s involved in. Join us in wishing Ashwani Yadav a very happy birthday and a year full of energy, success, and moments to cherish!

#HappyBirthday #TeamGriphic #Leadership #Inspiration #Visionary #CelebratingSuccess

We’re glad that Griphic felt like home, Arnab Halder. You earned your wins here. Keep that pace and keep in touch.

We’re proud of how far you’ve come during your internship here, and excited for where you go next!

#InternshipJourney #LifeAtGriphic #FutureReady #Internship #Cerebrus #CareerGrowth

This project gave me hands-on experience in 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻-𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗱𝘆 𝗚𝗲𝗻𝗔𝗜 𝗽𝗶𝗽𝗲𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀, 𝗺𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶-𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗼𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗹-𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱 𝗔𝗜 𝗱𝗲𝗽𝗹𝗼𝘆𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁.
I am immensely grateful to the 𝗚𝗿𝗶𝗽𝗵𝗶𝗰 𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗺 for their mentorship and for trusting me with a project of such scale and impact.
As I move forward, I’m excited to take on 𝗔𝗜/𝗠𝗟 𝗲𝗻𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗚𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗔𝗜 𝗼𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝘂𝗻𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗲𝘀 where I can continue to build impactful solutions.

6 months into 2025 and almost two years into building Griphic, we're finally watching the bigger picture unfold.
 
For the last few months, we’ve been using Cerebrus.app at Griphic internally for our own hiring, testing, refining, and iterating along the way. This first-hand experience has helped us validate whatever works, identify what doesn’t, and shape the product with the insight we gain.
 
As we grew, we’ve had the opportunity to attend industry events, receive recognition through awards, and even get featured in a few publications, all of which reinforced that we’re on the right track to tackling a core challenge.
Building a startup is not glamorous by any means. The last few months reminded us that steady progress, even behind the scenes, matters more than loud milestones.
To the team that brings this vision to life every day, thank you!
To everyone who’s offered guidance, encouragement, and tough love, we’re grateful!
We're getting ready to open up Cerebrus for everyone. The public launch is around the corner, and we’re looking forward to showing you what we've built in its full glory.
If you're venturing into HR tech, thinking about better ways to hire, or just curious about what we’re up to, let’s connect!

We recently conducted a poll asking job seekers what they value most in the interview process: Real-Time Feedback or Interview-Anytime Flexibility?

Turns out, 85% of the candidates expressed their inclination for instant feedback. In a process that is already quite lengthy and complex, candidates often seek clarity. They want to understand how they performed, what their strengths were, and where they can improve.

Timely feedback empowers them and gives them closure to proceed accordingly.

For a prize pool of ₹1,00,000, we challenged participants with a problem statement, for which they had to develop and present innovative solutions. 20 teams were shortlisted out of 60 entries, and the competition was intense!

Congratulations to Hustlers for taking home the top prize, and to The Risers and Tech-Virus, coming in at the second and third position respectively. Griphic applauds all participants for their inspiring solutions. We also extend a special thank you to @alapan kuila sir for helping us evaluate the submissions. 
Here are a few highlights from Byte Runners!

We are proud to announce that Siddhant Bansal, our founder & CEO has been recognized as the ‘Business Leader of the Year’ at the 33rd WORLD HRD Congress, held in Mumbai. This recognition is a testament to his vision and dedication to transforming the recruitment space through AI with the launch of Cerebrus.app

We are excited for the milestones ahead and the continued impact we will make in the industry.

#BusinessLeaderOfTheYear #WorldHRDCongress #Cerebrus #Griphic #BusinessLeader2025 #Leadership
company_updates.reshared_post_description:
I’m honored to be recognized as the ‘Young Business Leader of the Year’ at the 33rd WORLD HRD Congress. The thought of Cerebrus sparked during my second year at IIT Delhi. I felt that with the right knowledge and resources, I could help reshape the current recruitment landscape. I’m grateful to have had the support of my IIT peers, Ashwani Yadav and Pranshuman Bhouriyal, who immediately aligned with the vision. What started as an idea soon became a reality, and together we embarked on this journey to revolutionize hiring through Artificial Intelligence.

A huge thanks to my amazing team, who worked tirelessly to turn this vision into what it is today. This recognition is a massive milestone for team Griphic & Cerebrus.app and it will only drive us to achieve even greater things ahead.

company_updates.description:
Re-shaping the HR Landscape with Innovation!
 
Here are some glimpses of our visit to the 33rd edition of the WORLD HRD Congress as co-supporter and exhibitor.

Cerebrus, a product of Griphic, marked its presence at one of the most prestigious global platforms for HR innovation and leadership, held from February 17 to 19 in Mumbai.

We are leading the way in AI-driven hiring solutions and showcased the capabilities of our next-gen AI and metahuman technology which are rapidly transforming the recruitment process.

We’d like to thank the World HRD Congress for providing us with a platform to demonstrate how we are transforming traditional recruitment practices through cutting-edge technology and innovative strategies.

#WorldHRDCongress #HRInnovation #Cerebrus #Griphic #HRTech #Saas #AI #SmartHiring #HR #HiringSolutions #AutomatedInterviews #HRCommunity

We're Hiring AI Engineer! 

Are you passionate about AI, Large Language Models (LLMs), and cutting-edge technology? Do you want to work alongside Professor Tanmoy Chakraborty from IIT Delhi and push the boundaries of innovation? This is your chance! 

Griphic is looking for a highly skilled AI Engineer to join our dynamic team for Cerebrus. We specialize in conducting meta-human powered and AI driven interviews. 

🔹 What You Will Do: 
✅ Design, train, and fine-tune LLMs for NLP, conversational AI, and classification systems. 
✅ Develop state-of-the-art AI algorithms to solve complex challenges. 
✅ Build scalable AI pipelines and deploy models on AWS, GCP, or Azure. 
✅ Stay ahead with the latest AI advancements and collaborate with industry experts. 
✅ Work in a fast-paced, research-driven environment with world-class engineers.

🔹 What You Will Get: 
✨ The opportunity to work closely with AI professors from IIT Delhi on groundbreaking research. 
✨ Hands-on experience with cutting-edge AI and ML technologies. 
✨ A dynamic and collaborative work environment with top engineers. 
✨ Exposure to real-world AI applications that drive industry disruption. 
✨ Competitive salary and benefits.

🔹 What We Are Looking For: 
🎯 2-4 years of AI/ML development experience with LLMs. 
🎯 Expertise in Python, PyTorch and machine learning frameworks. 
🎯 Strong understanding of NLP, deep learning, and system design. 
🎯 Passion for AI research, innovation, and solving real-world problems.
 
If you’re ready to build the future of AI with us, apply now! 🚀 

📩 Send your resume and relevant work to jobs@griphic.com
